UpdateGroupID.description: Optional but required when including any or all of following parameters: ReportValue, ReportResult, ReportResultIsValid. The Update Group ID. If not provided, all clients will be returned.

ClientID.description: Optional. Filter where ClientID matches a value. Wildcards are supported (*).

Tag.description: Optional. Filter where Tag matches a value. Wildcards are supported (*).

ReportResult.description: Optional and UpdateGroupID must be included. Filter where ReportResult matches a value. Wildcards are supported (*).

ReportResultIsValid.description: Optional and UpdateGroupID must be included. When 'true' filters results where ReportResult equals ReportResultExpected.  When 'false' filters results where ValueToValidate does not equal ReportResults.

ReportValue.description: Optional and UpdateGroupID must be included. Filter where ReportValue matches a value. Wildcards are supported (*).

LastCheckInBefore.description: Optional. Filter where LastCheckIn occured before the provided date.

LastCheckInAfter.description: Optional. Filter where LastCheckIn occured after the provided date.

OrderBy.description:
Optional. Specify the order in which results should be returned. Use this format: [FieldName] [ASC|ASCENDING|DESC|DESCENDING],...   
            If sort direction is not provided for a field, it will be sorted ascending.

limit.description: Optional. The page limit. The default page limit is 10.

offset.description: Optional. The page offset. The default page offset is 0.

$block: A response containing a page of results and metadata concerning the results

$ul: **Limit**: The number of entities this paged response is limited to.
**Offset**: The number of entities prior to this page of items.
**ReportResultExpected**: The label for data contained in ClientStatus.ReportResults
**ReportResultLabel**: The label for data contained in ClientStatus.ReportResults
**ReportValueLabel**: The label for data contained in ClientStatus.ReportValue
**TotalCount**: The total number of entities matching the request.
